examples.text: Ama savcı Marchica hakkında taammüden adam öldürmekten; Pizzuco hakkında taammüden adam öldürmek ve adam öldürmeye azmettirmekten...tutuklama kararı vermişti.
examples.translation: But the prosecutor had issued an arrest warrant on Marchica for murder in a premeditated manner; on Pizzuco for murder in a premeditated manner and instigating to murder.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish تعمداً (taʿammüden), from Arabic تَعَمُّدًا (taʕammudan), adverbial accusative of تَعَمُّد (taʕammud), verbal noun of تَعَمَّدَ (taʕammada, “to intend, to do purposely”).
